subject: Re: FW: Please conduct a full review of the UN digital marketing site

full_threads.body: Salvador, Christine reacted to your message:

Hi Christine,

We’ve made the changes and sent the update over to you.

Please let me know if you need any further assistance!

Thanks Rica,

How did you go with the updates for Vivante, I need to review today before going live on Monday launch please.

Thanks,

Christine

Hi Christine, 

Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here are the links: 
https://unitronmarketing.com.au/blu/
https://unitronmarketing.com.au/marketing-catalogue/local-marketing/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi team,


Please find updates below in both Irene's email and my email below hers for Blu and Local marketing.


Thank you,
Christine

Cc: Sinclair, Cameron <Cameron.Sinclair@sonova.com>
Subject: RE: Please conduct a full review of the UN digital marketing site


Hi Christine,


The below should also be removed from the Blu section as this is not current now.

Same as above for the below - please add 'Datasheet' to these headings.







Thanks.




Kind regards,


Irene Kalligeris

Subject: RE: Please conduct a full review of the UN digital marketing site


Thanks Irene,


Please refer to the below and add any edits you may have so that we can send all the updates in one go - please add if I have missed anything.
Thank you for sending through the updates for Vivante launch.

  • Please remove all the order forms and use the ones attached - most current.

From: Kalligeris, Irene <Irene.Kalligeris@sonova.com>
Sent: 01 November 2024 5:25 PM
To: Salvador, Christine <Christine.Salvador@unitron.com>
Cc: Sinclair, Cameron <Cameron.Sinclair@sonova.com>
Subject: Please conduct a full review of the UN digital marketing site


Hi Christine,


Could you please conduct a full review of the digital marketing site and remove items that are no longer current.


For example, if you have any old product catalogues e.g. in the Blu (or other) section/s, please remove these as these are not current and may cause confusion for our customers.


Please also remove any older versions of forms and upload the new forms - you can find these in the MS Teams Forms folder. Please use the Order Form Register to assist you as to which versions are most current.


If you have previous (old) versions of TrueFit software download links, please remove these as again these may confuse our customers.
We should only have one TrueFit software link on this site at a time - the latest version. This is moreso a reminder for future and the next update coming next week.


Also, you may wish to review the content in the local marketing support folder, where you have info e.g. Olympics 2024 which I doubt will be needed going forward? Perhaps remove this type of content from the site?


There are other folders/docs here and there that could be removed or updated also.
If you get stuck let me know.


Thanks.


Irene Kalligeris
Head of Audiology & Product

Sonova Australia Pty Ltd

12 Inglewood Place, NSW 2153 Norwest, AU
Phone: +61 477 722 271
Email: irene.kalligeris@sonova.com
Website: www.sonova.com
